product_name: Whispbar by Yakima WB400 J-Cradle Kayak Rack
long_description: Designed to carry up to 80 lb. kayaks on their side to conserve valuable space atop your crossbars, the WB400 J-Cradle Kayak Rack from Whispbar offers a high-quality, refined design.
short_description: Designed to carry up to 80 lb. kayaks on their side to conserve valuable space atop your crossbars, the WB400 J-Cradle Kayak Rack from Whispbar offers a high-quality, refined design.
